title: About me.
description_line1: Hello, my name is Leonne Brito. I started my career as a software engineer in 2015 working with Ruby.
description_line2: I am currently Software Engineer at nav9. Before that I worked as a Software Engineer at Reserva. I am from Parauapebas, Pará and I am packing my bags to move to Florianópolis, Santa Catarina with my wife and son.
description_line3: I am passionate about technology, music, e-ports, and games. I enjoy learning new things and sharing knowledge.
